title: Expectant Father
description: BABY ON THE WAY!In one shocking night, Glory Danson and Caleb Masters made a baby! Now Glory was in real trouble. Caleb was a brilliant -- and brooding -- scientist bent on saving the world -- certainly not father material! Could ten tiny fingers and ten chubby toes turn this confirmed bachelor into a family man?Caleb didn't know what had come over him. One minute he was holding the sexiest woman he'd ever known. The next he was proposing marriage! Wedding the mother of his child was the right thing to do. But love -- well, that was a whole other experiment.... Or was it?
author: Leanne Banks
